short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An application for buying rights to use images from instagram users

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Every wanted to use a photo you found on instagram but you can't since you do not own the rights to it? Well now you can use our app to make us handle the purchasing process for rights to use an image from an Instagram user.
